NewsArticle.Title: Result - The Birdman's Missing Eggs
NewsArticle.Content: As it turns out, a gang of thieves had stolen Pieydagnelle's eggs! Aislings were recruited to find and return them to him! Congratulations to the following Aislings who found and returned an egg to Pieydagnelle. Morsmordre, Ekei,Jaggerjr, Swiftsolider, Kiiru, Arthaidd, Xkhaos, Lemmon, Kelborn, Meptius, Biomagus, Lris, Sacravis, Gojira, Mightymika, Ashleyriot, Xduloricx, Cairistacia, Malukobr, Loya, Ishikawa, Meptius, Firstaid, Wildstar, Aruga Thanks to everyone who participated!
